snippet: President Obama is following the path of Senator Michael Bennet, who defeated a conservative Republican in 2010, a year of struggle for Democrats.
abstract: Obama campaign, desperate to win Colorado and its nine electoral votes, is trying to assemble the same coalition that Sen Michael Bennet built in 2010, when he defeated a conservative Republican in a year in which Democrats struggled both in Colorado and nationally; Bennet's team is advising Pres Obama on his state campaign.
lead_paragraph: President Obama is following the path of Senator Michael Bennet, who defeated a conservative Republican in 2010, a year of struggle for Democrats.

headline.seo: In Colorado, Obama Takes Page From Surprise Democratic Win
headline.main: Obama Takes a Page From an Unexpected Victory in Colorado
headline.print_headline: In Colorado, Obama Takes Page From Unexpected Democratic Victory
